document_data.name: Mallin
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mallin''' was a [[lich]] and one of the lovers—and skulls—of [[Tashara of the Seven Skulls]].

After [[Azuth]] defeated Tashara, her seven skulls split apart, and went in many directions. The skull of Mallin took residence in a shattered tower in [[Myth Rhynn]], where he collected and studied [[magic]]. He sent visions via magic and spread rumors of great treasure to lure [[adventurer]]s to him, so he might steal their magic.<ref><ref>{{Cite dragon/206/Tashara of the Seven Skulls|76}}
